description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for the Orders Screen in a restaurant frontend app. It displays a list of orders, including order status, date, total, and order lines with details.

classes.name: OrdersScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of customer orders or a message if there are no orders.

classes.name: _OrderCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a card for an individual order, showing status, ID, date, total, and order lines.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the OrdersScreen, either showing a message for no orders or a list of order cards.

methods.name: _OrderCard.build
methods.description: Builds the widget for displaying details of a single order, including an expandable list of order lines.
